content:
TITLE: Running WebdriverIO Tests with Page Object Model
DESCRIPTION: Command to run tests that utilize the Page Object Model pattern on local browsers.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-tu-webdriverio/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run on-prem-pom
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Data-Driven WebdriverIO Tests
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute data-driven tests that use external data sources to control test execution.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-tu-webdriverio/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run on-prem-datadriven
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Parallel Tests on BrowserStack
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute tests in parallel on the BrowserStack cloud platform across multiple browser configurations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-tu-webdriverio/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run browserstack-parallel
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Parallel Tests on On-Premise Browsers
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute tests in parallel on multiple local browsers to improve test execution speed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-tu-webdriverio/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run on-prem-parallel
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Parallel Tests on Docker Selenium Grid
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute tests in parallel on Docker Selenium Grid to improve test execution speed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-tu-webdriverio/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run docker-parallel
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running WebdriverIO Tests on Docker Selenium Grid
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute tests on a Docker Selenium Grid setup. Requires Docker service to be running.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-tu-webdriverio/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run docker
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running WebdriverIO Tests on BrowserStack
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute tests on the BrowserStack cloud testing platform instead of local browsers.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-tu-webdriverio/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run browserstack
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating WebdriverIO Test Reports
DESCRIPTION: Command to generate formatted test reports after test execution is complete.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-tu-webdriverio/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run generate-report
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies for WebdriverIO Tests
DESCRIPTION: Command to install all required npm dependencies for the WebdriverIO test framework.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-tu-webdriverio/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Basic On-Premise WebdriverIO Tests
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute basic WebdriverIO tests on local browsers.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/browserstack-tu-webdriverio/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run on-prem
```
